title: The schema for the CIBA request object login_hint_token

phone.title: The phone of the subject identity to authorise

email.title: The email of the subject identity to authorise

username.title: The username of the subject identity to authorise

api_provider_token.title: A token generated by the customer authentication device
api_provider_token.description: Uniquely identifies the Customer authentication device and Customer with the API Provider

third_party_token.title: A token generated by the third party and registered with the customer authentication device

aud.title: The audiences for the login hint token
aud.description: The value should be or include the API Provider Issuer Identifier URL

iat.description: Time on which the login hint token was issued. May be used for determining age

exp.description: Expiration time on or after which the login hint token SHOULD NOT be accepted for processing.

nbf.description: Time before which the login hint token SHOULD NOT be accepted for processing.

iss.title: The Issuer of the token
iss.description: The value should be the client ID of the third party, unless signed by a different party

jti.title: The unique identifier of the token
jti.description: Used for determining token uniqueness. The value should be have sufficient entropy to make likelihood of collisions negligible.

sub.description: Subject Identifier, optionally to be consumed by the API provider
